title: Assessing the Aging and Environmental Implications of Polyethylene Mulch Films in Agricultural Land
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00102H, Paper
Chao Zhang, Xingyu Liu, Li Zhang, Qidong Chen, Qiyong Xu
Polyethylene mulch films (MF) are widely employed in agricultural land to enhance crop yield and quality, but the MF residue causes significant environmental concerns. To promote the sustainable application of...
